lead_paragraph: This season, Brett Favre has set the N.F.L. career records for victories (topping John Elway’s 148 on Sept. 16) and touchdowns (topping Dan Marino’s 420 on Sept. 23), and is closing in on Marino’s mark for passing yards. All this has happened in a season in which the Packers (8-1) are looking like a playoff team for the first time since 2004.
